summary: AN ORDINANCE ratifying and confirming the actions of the Fire Chief, the Director of Engineering and the Acting Director of Administrative Services (formerly the Department of General Services) in supplying personnel, services, and equipment to assist the City of Yakima in meeting problems caused by the Mt. St. Helens eruption; authorizing an agreement with the City of Yakima providing for reimbursement of costs and expenses incurred by the City; and providing for payment of such costs and expenses.
